snippet.title: Game Boy Advance Longplay [103] Shaman King - Master of Spirits
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

Longplay of Shaman King - Master of Spirits, a game made by Konami. This is the first Shaman King game that was developed for the Game Boy Advance in North America and it was developed to accompany the english dub by 4kids Entertainment.

Is a plataform game based on anime/mangá Shaman King (created by Hiroyuki Takei and one of my favorites) and is centered around Yoh Asakura and his battles to become Shaman King.

This Shaman King Title is only awarded every 500 years and so many shamans fight against each other in search of that title! With the help of his friends, your spirit Amidamaru and his girlfriend Anne, our hero sets out to find the Shaman fight for the title while they struggle to fight the forces of demonic Magister! A good game with explorative metroidvania style. Longplay included all spirits collected! -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
